node.name: Sonfest
node.shortDescription: Worship, be encouraged, and connect with other teens!

description.description:
6th-12th graders! Students from all over the valley will come together to worship, be encouraged, and connect with other teens at this exciting retreat!

August 3-5

Peery’s Egyptian Theater Ogden, Utah

$120.00/student - includes a day @ LAGOON, Sonfest t-shirt, worship sessions with Sean Patrick (worship) & Ryan Young (speaker) , 2 nights lodging (plus breakfast!).

Ladies BRING A FRIEND EVENTS are the perfect opportunity to connect the ladies in your life to the ladies @ Lifestone! We can’t wait to get to know the friends you invite! We've got the main course covered! Please bring an appetizer, salad, side, or dessert to share!

Rosanne Brophy's Neighborhood Clubhouse
4831 River Chase Road

The 2018-2019 school year will be here before we know it, and August 12th will be an exciting Sunday at Lifestone as we promote:

- children entering 1st grade from Little Life up to Kids Life.
- children entering 6th grade from Kids Life up to Lifestone Youth (meets Wednesdays 6:30pm).

DONATE SCHOOL SUPPLIES FOR FAMILIES IN NEED!

The Concern Center of Salt Lake will gift all donations to families in need. Bring popular school supply items such as backpacks, pencils, markers, rulers, binders, spiral notebooks, etc. to the Lifestone lobby on Sunday mornings July 22 - August 12.

node.name: Living Proof Simulcast with Beth Moore
node.shortDescription: Join Beth and thousands of women worldwide as she shares truth to guide your own journey of faith.

description.description:
$25 includes event, lunch, snacks + Living Proof Simulcast program

Location: Lifestone Church 3443 W 12600 S Riverton

Join Beth and thousands of women worldwide as she shares truth to guide your own journey of faith. You're invited to be part of this global, one-day simulcast that will encourage you to dive deeper into the Word of God. Beth follows the leading of the Holy Spirit to prepare a specific message for each of her events, and the simulcast is no exception. Along with Beth Moore, one of today’s top women’s ministry leaders, worship pastor, and Dove Award recipient Travis Cottrell will lead worship via simulcast. Don't miss out on this special event! Register today!

For more information on Living Proof Simulcast, contact Dixie Wise at 208-520-7897 or wisepeace88@gmail.com.

node.name: Exploring Family Membership
node.shortDescription: Join us and discover what it means to be a Lifestone family member.

description.description: Are you loving Lifestone? Ready to get more connected? Join us Sunday 9/16 @ Lifestone and discover what it means to be a Lifestone family member. Lifestone is committed to loving God, loving people, and sharing with everyone in our community and beyond, real life in Christ. We can't wait to share how YOU can be part of making this vision a reality!

node.name: Raising Arrows Playdate
node.shortDescription: ALL moms are welcome! We meet every few weeks to let our kiddos play and enjoy connecting with women in our community.

description.description:
ALL moms are welcome! We meet every few weeks to let our kiddos play and enjoy connecting with women in our community. 

Young motherhood can be a challenging season of life. Having a strong support group can help you make it through the tough times and celebrate during the good times! 

Psalm 127:3-4
Children are a gift from the Lord; they are a reward from him. Like arrows in the hands of a warrior are children born in one's youth.

You can also connect with [Raising Arrows on Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/groups/233969883862637/ "Raising Arrows on Facebook")

node.name: See You at the Pole
node.shortDescription: A prayer rally where students meet at the school flagpole before school to lift up their friends, families, teachers, school, and neighbors!

description.description: See You at the Pole™, the global day of student prayer, began in 1990 as a grass roots movement with ten students praying at their school. Twenty years later, millions pray on their campuses on the fourth Wednesday in September. SEE YOU AT THE POLE day is on Wednesday, September 26, at 7:00 a.m. local time. All around the globe, in every time zone, students will be gathering at their flagpoles, praying for their school, friends, families, churches, and communities. SEE YOU AT THE POLE is a day committed to global unity in Christ and prayer for your generation.

node.name: Bring your Bible to School Day
node.shortDescription: Thousands of students across the whole country share God’s hope and celebrate religious freedom by doing something simple, yet powerful.

description.description:
[bringyourbible.org](https://www.bringyourbible.org/ "bringyourbible.org")

Bring Your Bible to School Day! Happening this year on October 4th — thousands of students across the whole country share God’s hope and celebrate religious freedom by doing something simple, yet powerful: They bring their Bibles to school and talk about it with friends!

node.name: Music in the Park

description.description:
WE'RE MOVING THIS PARTY INSIDE! Due to inclement weather, the event will no longer be held at the park. Please join us instead at Lifestone Church for an exciting evening of music presented by the Lifestone Church band! Everyone is welcome! Treats will be served.

See you 4-6pm Saturday Oct. 6 3443 W 12600 S Riverton (just east of Riverton hospital).

node.name: 5 Year Anniversary
node.shortDescription: Make plans to join us for this exciting celebration at 9am or 10:30am!

description.description:
Make plans to join us for this exciting celebration! 

Make plans to join us for this exciting celebration! We are so thankful for all God has done and is continuing to do through Lifestone Church. He deeply loves the people in our community, and we love helping them discover this truth! Join us as at 9am or 10:30am to celebrate all God has is doing through our church. We’ll enjoy a slideshow of memories and a special treat in the café!

ON DAYLIGHT SAVINGS NOVEMBER 4, we will begin our new service times! These slightly later times will allow us to reach more people. If you currently attend the 10:30 service, please prayerfully consider attending our new 9:30 service beginning on the 4th. This will allow more room for new visitors, especially families with young children to attend the late service. Since this is the GOOD Daylight Savings, you can actually attend our new 9:30 service that day *without losing any sleep at all!*

node.name: Share the Warmth: Rescue Mission Drive

description.description:
Lifestone Students are doing a clothing drive for the Rescue Mission in SLC. Students will be organizing items and making blessing bags with encouraging notes for people experiencing homelessness. Please bring items by December 12th. Students will put items together to deliver on Saturday, December 15th.

Please donate new or lightly used:

- warm hats
- gloves or mittens
- coats
- boots
- blankets
- sleeping bags
- hand warmers
- socks
- drawstring backpacks
- Other items needed for blessing bags: (travel Size)
- Soap
- Toothpaste
- Toothbrush
- Washcloth
- body wash
- Shampoo
- conditioner
- deodorant
- emergency blanket
- flashlight
- tissues
- Chapstick

Mark your calendars!! Friday, November 9th FALL FLING for High School Students 9th-12th grade!

Next month, we're getting students together for a night of worship, learning & fellowship! Meet @ Lifestone Church at 8:30pm! The event will start at 9pm at the Rising Church for Worship & Teaching. Then the party will continue @ Classic Fun Center from 11:30pm-3:30AM!! We will then grab some breakfast at Village Inn where parents will pick up!

node.name: Operation Christmas Child
node.shortDescription: __Please bring boxes no later than Sunday, November 11th.__ Boxes and more info are available in Lifestone's lobby!

description.description:
__Please bring boxes no later than Sunday, November 11th.__
Boxes and more info are available in Lifestone's lobby!

Operation Christmas Child is a project of Samaritan’s Purse, an international relief organization. Their mission is to provide local partners around the world with shoeboxes filled with small toys, hygiene items, and school supplies as a means of reaching out to children in their own communities with the Good News of Jesus Christ. They ship these simple gifts outside the United States to children affected by war, poverty, natural disaster, famine, and disease; and to children living on Native American reservations in the U.S.

node.name: Can Food Drive
node.shortDescription: Let's stock the shelves at the Concern Center of Salt Lake this holiday season!

description.description:
Let's stock the shelves at the Concern Center of Salt Lake this holiday season! The Concern Center is the benevolence arm of the churches of the Salt Lake Baptist Association. It is one way we show Christ’s love to those in need.

Donation box located in the lobby.

7 churches will come together for a night of worship through music, testimony, prayer and thankfulness of who God is and what He has done! Everyone is welcome.

Please bring non-parishable food items if you can. Donations go to Concern Center of Salt Lake, the benevolence arm of the churches of the Salt Lake Baptist Association. It is one way we show Christ’s love to those in need.

node.name: LADIES CHRISTMAS PARTY

description.description:
Invite a gal pal and join us for a "Favorite Things" Christmas party & gift exchange! This is an awesome opportunity for the women in your life to connect with women at Lifestone. We'll enjoy Ashley Klaja's famous desserts (featured on Studio 5) and hot chocolate bar.

Please bring one of your "favorite things" for a gift exchange. (Please don't spend more than $10.) Examples: candle, cozy socks, lotion or body spray, candy

Klaja Residence: 5014 W. Table Top Way South Jordan

description.description:
We will meet @ Lifestone Church Saturday, December 15th @ 4:45pm and depart @5pm sharp to head to The Rescue Mission in SLC to hand out blessing bags and visit with people who are experiencing homelessness. We will return at 7:30pm for parent pick up.

Please sign up so we can provide ample transportation!

node.name: Christmas Eve @ Lifestone
node.shortDescription: Invite your friends and family out and let's celebrate Jesus' birth with a candlelight service and Christmas carols.

description.description: Invite your friends and family out Monday December 24th and let's celebrate Jesus' birth with a candlelight service and Christmas carols. Enjoy Christmas treats and we'll have a small gift for the kids!

node.name: Women's Bible Study
node.shortDescription: 12-week in-depth study

description.description:
12-Week In-Depth Ladies Bible Study

Join Beth in a faith-building study of prophecy and learn how to live with integrity in today's self-absorbed society. The prophet Daniel faced unbelievable pressures to compromise his faith, to live in a hostile culture, and to confront temptations and threats. Today, believers in Jesus Christ face many of the same trials. You'll love connecting with other women as you study God's Word together!

Questions? Contact Dixie Wise: wisepeace88@gmail.com  801-208-520-7897

node.name: Men's Bible Study
node.shortDescription: 6-week in-depth Bible study

description.description:
6-week in-depth Bible study

33 The Series: A man and His Traps challenges and equips men to go below the surface, to look deep into their hearts and explore some areas that are all too easy to ignore but that are critical in their journey toward Authentic Manhood. It will introduce a framework and a process that will help us understand what lies behind the manhood traps and beneath the heart idols that can distract us from the truth and the power of the Gospel. 

Next we'll format a biblical battle plan that will help us replace specific temptations and struggles with God's better promises. We'll deal head-on with issues that all of us as men can relate to like sexual lust, the need for control, unfounded fear and the pursuit of significance.  

Questions? Contact Pastor Ben: ben@lifestonechurch.net 817-565-8316

node.shortDescription: ALL ladies are welcome! We meet up regularly to let our kiddos play and enjoy connecting with women in our community. Join us at the beautiful new Ice Ribbon behind Herriman City Hall.

node.name: Football Sunday
node.shortDescription: You're invited to Football Sunday 2.3.19 @ Lifestone 9:30 AND 11am.  FEEL FREE TO SPORT YOUR FAVORITE TEAM JERSEY!

description.description:
🏈 WE CAN'T WAIT FOR FOOTBALL SUNDAY! 🏈

You're invited to Football Sunday 2.3.19 @ Lifestone 9:30 AND 11am. 
FEEL FREE TO SPORT YOUR FAVORITE TEAM JERSEY!

Invite your friends to join us for "Football Sunday", an exciting video event that will play across America on the day of the Super Bowl. The video will feature the movement of God in the lives of professional football players in exclusive interviews as they share their faith in Christ.

Last year over 5,000 churches participated in Football Sunday nationwide and over 3,000,000 people showed up for the event! Please take advantage of this amazing opportunity to invite your friends, family, neighbors and co-workers to have FUN at church and hear the good news that God loves them and wants to dramatically change their lives!

node.name: Love & Respect Marriage Seminar
node.shortDescription: Whether single, married, or dating, their insight will bring life-altering truth to your relationships.

description.description:
Fri evening & Saturday Feb 22-23
Cost per person: $45
Location: K2 the Church 5049 South Murray Blvd Murray
Hosted by: K2 the Church & South Mountain Community Church

Two key ingredients to a successful marriage: Love and Respect. Find out the secret hidden in plain sight for over 2,000 years at the upcoming conference! World-renowned speaker and bestselling author, Dr. Emerson Eggerichs, and his wife Sarah will be speaking at this powerful marriage conference. Whether single, married, or dating, their insight will bring life-altering truth to your relationships.

Register now to reserve your spot!

node.name: 3rd Annual Men's Bake Auction!
node.shortDescription: Men, it's time to get your bake on! Please make plans to whip up your favorite treat to help send Lifestone students to camp this summer.

description.description:
Men, it's time to get your bake on! Please make plans to whip up your favorite treat for the auction. Bidding will begin BETWEEN the 2 Sunday services, so no matter which you attend, just drop your yumminess in the lobby on the way in. 

EVERYONE ELSE! Come prepared to bid GENEROUSLY! Cash and checks preferred. Bidding will continue following 11am service. 

All proceeds go toward sending Lifestone Junior High & High School students to summer camps where they will have a blast discovering how much God loves them.

node.name: Youth Camp 2019
node.shortDescription: WE CAN'T WAIT FOR CAMP! This summer we are headed back to Big Canyon Ranch in Wanship, Utah (near Park City) for camp!

description.description:
WE CAN'T WAIT FOR CAMP!
This summer we are headed back to Big Canyon Ranch in Wanship, Utah (near Park City) for camp! This is always one of the most exciting events for students! Our days at camp will be packed full of dynamic worship experiences-including one on a mountaintop- devotional teen Bible studies & group discussions, field games, beach volleyball, challenge courses, a giant swing, rock climbing, s'mores around campfires and a TON of fun!!!
 
We love this opportunity for students to step out of their everyday life and routine in order to spend time connecting with God and with their peers from several participating churches. Our prayer is that many students attending will begin to trust in Jesus as Savior for the first time as they hear the Good News that God loves them, and that others will grow in their existing relationship with God.

Registration to follow!
